casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Jose RUIZ Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 3, 2019

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn.App. 413, 204 A.3d 798 (2019), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court correctly conclude that the one-on-one show up identification was not unnecessarily suggestive?"
